thread.title: Duo nabbed for kidnapping after R20 000 ransom demand
thread.title_full: Duo nabbed for kidnapping after R20 000 ransom demand | News24

author: news24.com
title: Duo nabbed for kidnapping after R20 000 ransom demand
text:
Cape Town - Two men were arrested at a house in Fordsburg on Sunday afternoon for allegedly kidnapping a man five weeks ago.
The duo, aged 28 and 29, were arrested by Johannesburg Central police after they allegedly abducted the 23-year-old victim, police spokesperson Warrant Officer Xoli Mbele confirmed in a statement.
"Relatives of the victim came today [Sunday] to report the case after receiving a private call demanding a ransom of R20 000," he said.
A resident tipped off the authorities on the whereabouts of the victim.
